Blog.post: "Goodbye PC" Of all the things I've seen in I just want to get it over with Thoughts form inside my mind But I do not try Counting the days that pass me by I've been searching deep down in my books Thingsthat I'm seeing are starting to get bold It feels like I'm starting all over again The last three days were just pretend And I said, [Chorus:] Goodbye pc Goodbye to pc ineverything that I knew You know i always try The one thing that I always believe in The one thing that I always believe in I still get lost in your eyes And it seems that I can't live a day without you Closing my eyes and you chase my thoughts away To a place where I am blinded by the light But it's not right [Chorus] And its hurtless to want everything and nothing at the same time I want what's inside and I want what's mine I want you But you're not giving in this time [Chorus x2] And when thework begins I'll stayblank at the screen you're getting a restart

Was at the In service the whole afternoon. It was a good tour as we went to the heritage center there to recap the history of the force. Saw many things there which i think is a good thing that trainees should have the opportunity to go too. but as for my time i do not have that kind of chance to go there. During the trip the whole display was good but somehow still left out somethings that the force should have put in. like the old OPS room machines that they use can still put it into the heritage to signify the growth. when i first go to the air force center there were lots more things to see so the force should also take the steps to improve the displays.

UWF AGM an annual meeting for the department. This yr was totally a mess only a few of them turn up for it and the rest was like Huh! kind of attitude. Still miss my first AGM it was like so fun everyone was there and everyone was sabotaging each other to become the next welfare officers. When running, clock 32:48 still bad from my last one clock 32:42. I think I'm getting old. Think still needs to improve on the curve running skill as i always slow down at the curve up the hill. Updating my PDA and reading some news on the net. Tmr will be a short day i hope.

yah i got a shock. i met my old sec friend while on my way back home. Yes, it was a surprise for me but theres one thing that trouble me. He told me that one of our friend met an accident and had to amputat one leg due to the the serious hitting on his knee cap. My friend told me that in the first place that he intended to keep it but wasn't able to or he cannot choose to as his leg was bleeding profusely from the wound. In the end he chose to had his leg amputated. When i heard it i was like so shock that i think i stunned and my friend was like am i ok ? i was ok but i felt a sudden sadness that came from the bottom of my heart. i asked "Why is thishappening to my friend?" He signed on as a regular and had great future. Why did he deserves this fate? With all this happening to him, i don't know he can take it and carry on with his life. I hope he can get well soon get better with life. i know that he will never get over it. Will one get over it? No! yes, its a straight no! no one can get over it. even i can't get over the matter myself. What is happening? Just this month one of our mdm's mum departed and just today i recieved news from my friend that his grandpa has gone. just one month i recieve so many sad news. äººçæå¤§çæ²åï¼æ¯èªå·±å°åéæ²æå¸æï¼ äººçæå£çç¿æ £ï¼æ¯èªå·±å°å·¥ä½æ²æè¨åã

accompany my friend to the starhub road show @TSC. actually i don't know that they are having this Qian ming hui with Tony leung but somehow i manage to get to see it. woah real person man. but however he wears his favorite sunglass and i can't see his eyes tou... my friend manage to sign up for the maxonline 3000 with a free router and a USB base station. woah! wat a waste that i should have wait for this promotion. nvm its HUbbing time. and i also did a evil sin "shopping" arghhh... i bough a natural pouch and a quicksilver wallet. although cheap but it already burnt a hole in my pocket... how am i goin to survive till the end? btw look out for pictures @ urlLink http://nigellus.blogspot.com more coming up with fireworks. Singapore Fireworrs Festival 2004 National Day celebrations will never be the same again. It will have a 4 night's of star-studded extravaganza of international stars at the Marina Promenade. It will showcase a glittering potpourri of stars from the world over. Hosted by the DJ from Power 98 and YES 933,the 3-hour long concert will be a field day for fervent fans.
starts with the new and abandon the old past is history todayis present tomorrow is future life is light that lits the path to the fate you follows.
very exciting show.
sucks under expectation. the apprentice will continue tmr.

whats with the new apprentice? no its not about the tv show its about the take over of my job. yes, will be ord-ing soon so will my new apprentice handle the job better than me maybe. the interview will starts tomorrow at the training school. hope i get the new good apprentice.
obsessive compulsive

The real run has started have u got your pack? new dd

someone got pissed . yah someone somehow it was words that cause these things to happen. yes it is. i believe it will be over soon but still memories of the unhappiness will stay intact. To forget or remember. I was reading this manga xXx HoLic from CLAMP one of the famous comic publisher. The recent one xXx 4 was on something abt words. It says that words is one of the element that can bined one person to another. Its a snow ball effect if it was not handle properly. i mean it was not the first time but i think they gone too far. But somehow or rather it still needs 2 hands to clap. there must have always a cause and effect. i'm not saying that i'm a great person but experience tell me that to access the situation is to stay quiet and it will be the best way. it doesn't mean that i admitted the things other says but i have a clear conscience. if get angry over the words they says then congrate they won! yes, by making you angry. sometimes i do agree that i been harsh too but i think i'm frustrated somehow. ä½ éæ¶è¦è®¤å½ï¼å ä¸ºä½ æ¯äººã
